benchmark_details.name: VITAL
benchmark_details.overview: VITAL is a new benchmark dataset comprising 13.1K value-laden situations and 5.4K multiple-choice questions focused on health, designed to assess and benchmark pluralistic alignment methodologies.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the pluralistic alignment of LLMs specifically within the health domain.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: The benchmark may not encompass all health-related perspectives and values.

data.source: Various surveys, polls, and moral scenario datasets focused on health.
data.annotation: Semi-automatically filtered and confirmed with human validation.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on alignment performance comparisons using standard evaluation techniques.
methodology.interpretation: Higher values indicate better performance in aligning with pluralistic values.
methodology.validation: Human validation confirmed the relevance and health-related nature of 80% of analyzed samples.

targeted_risks.demographic_analysis: The dataset aims to reflect diverse health beliefs and values across different demographic groups.
